channel.title: Notification on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Notification on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification Service Datatype Description SoftLayer Customers can use this service to view all of the available notifications that can be subscribed to. Some of the notifications are required while others are not. Methods getAllObjects Retrieve all Notifications that can be subscribed to. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Notification record. getPreferences Retrieve the preferences related to the notification. These are preferences are configurable and optional for subscribers to use.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile Service Datatype Description SoftLayer Customers can use this service to view all of the available mobile notifications that can be subscribed to. No mobile notifications are required. Methods createSubscriberForMobileDevice Create a new subscriber for a given resource. getAllObjects Retrieve all Notifications that can be subscribed to. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile record. getPreferences Retrieve the preferences related to the notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Service Datatype Description The [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]] service represents all events with potential to cause a disruption in service. Methods acknowledgeNotification getAcknowledgedFlag Retrieve indicates whether or not this event has been acknowledged by the user. getAllObjects getAttachedFile Retrieve a file attached to an event. getAttachments Retrieve a collection of attachments for this event which provide supplementary information to impacted users some examples are RFO (Reason For Outage) and root cause analysis documents.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User Service Datatype Description Methods acknowledge Acknowledge the associated [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]] for this impacted user. getAllObjects Returns a collection of impacted users, an account master user has the ability to see all impacted users under the account. getImpactedDeviceCount A count representing the number of the user's devices currently impacted by the associated event will be returned. getImpactedResources Retrieve a collection of resources impacted by the associated event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber Service Datatype Description SoftLayer Customers can subscribe to receive notifications for various notification types. This service also allows you to “turn on” or “turn off” notification messages sent to a subscriber for certain notifications. Methods createObject Create a new notification subscriber. editObject Edit a notification subscriber active status getDeliveryMethods Retrieve the delivery methods used to send the subscribed notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing Service Datatype Description SoftLayer Customers can subscribe to receive notifications for various notification types. This service also allows you to “turn on” or “turn off” notification messages sent to a subscriber for certain notifications. Methods createObject Create a new notification subscriber. editObject Edit a notification subscriber active status getDeliveryMethods Retrieve the delivery methods used to send the subscribed notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile Service Datatype Description SoftLayer Customers can subscribe to receive notifications for various notification types. This service also allows you to “turn on” or “turn off” notification messages sent to a subscriber for certain notifications. Methods clearSnoozeTimer createObject Create a new notification subscriber. editObject Edit a notification subscriber active status getDeliveryMethods Retrieve the delivery methods used to send the subscribed notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference Service Datatype Description Methods createObject Create a new notification preference for a subscriber. editObjects getDefaultPreference Retrieve details such name, keyname, minimum and maximum values for the preference. getNotificationUserSubscriber Retrieve details of the subscriber tied to the preference. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference record.

item.title: Get Notifications
item.description: Retrieves all notifications that were created on January 1, 2016. require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) theDate = '01/01/2017 01:00:00' theFilter = { 'startDate'=> { 'operation'=> 'greaterThanDate', 'options'=> [ {'name'=> 'date', 'value' => [theDate]} ] } } getresults = client['SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event'].getAllObjects(filter=theFilter) pp getresults

item.title: Get Notifications
item.description: Retrieves all notifications that were created on January 1, 2016. import SoftLayer from pprint import pprint as pp class example(): def __init__(self): self.client = SoftLayer.Client() def main(self): theDate = '01/01/2016 01:00:00' _filter = { 'startDate': { 'operation': 'greaterThanDate', 'options': [ {'name': 'date', 'value': [theDate]} ] } } result = self.client['SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event'].getAllObjects(filter=_filter) pp(result) if __name__ == "__main__": main = example() main.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification Service Datatype Description Details provided for the notification are basic. Details such as the related preferences, name and keyname for the notification can be retrieved. The keyname property for the notification can be used to refer to a notification when integrating into the SoftLayer Notification system. The name property can used more for display purposes. Local id Unique identifier for the notification. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Delivery_Method
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Delivery_Method Datatype Description Provides details for the delivery methods available. Local active Determines if the delivery method is still used by the system. Type: integer description Description used for the delivery method. Type: string id Unique identifier for the various notification delivery methods. Type: integer keyName Name that can be used by external systems to refer to delivery method.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile Service Datatype Description This is an extension of the SoftLayer_Notification class. These are implementation details specific to those notifications which can be subscribed to and received on a mobile device. Local id Unique identifier for the notification. Type: integer keyName Name that can be used by external systems to refer to a notification. Type: string name Friendly name for the notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Account
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Account Datatype Description Local active Type: integer Relational account Type: SoftLayer_Account lastNotificationUpdate Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Update notificationOccurrenceEvent Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Service Datatype Description Local endDate When this event will end. Type: dateTime id Unique identifier for this event. Type: integer lastImpactedUserCount Latest count of users impacted by this event. Type: integer modifyDate When this event was last updated. Type: dateTime recoveryTime Type: integer startDate When this event started.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Attachment
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Attachment Datatype Description SoftLayer events can have have files attached to them by a SoftLayer employee. Attaching a file to a event is a way to provide supplementary information such as a RFO (reason for outage) document or root cause analysis. The SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Attachment data type models a single file attached to a event. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event::getAttachedFile seeAlso SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Local createDate The date the file was attached to the event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event_Type Datatype Description This represents the type of SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event. Local keyName The friendly unique identifier for this event type. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource Datatype Description This type contains general information relating to any hardware or services that may be impacted by a SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer resourceAccountId Type: integer resourceName Type: string resourceTableId Type: integer Relational notificationOccurrenceEvent The associated event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource_Hardware Datatype Description This type contains general information related to a [[SoftLayer_Hardware]] resource that is impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string publicIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer

Local active Type: integer filterLabel Type: string hostname Type: string notificationOccurrenceEventId Type: integer privateIp Type: string publicIp Type: string resourceAccountId Type: integer

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Status_Code Datatype Description Local description Type: string keyName Type: string name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Update
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Update Datatype Description Local contents Type: string createDate Type: dateTime endDate Type: dateTime startDate Type: dateTime Relational employee Type: SoftLayer_User_Employee notificationOccurrenceEvent Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User Service Datatype Description This type contains general information relating to a user that may be impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local acknowledgedFlag Type: integer active Type: integer id Type: integer usrRecordId Type: integer Relational impactedResources A collection of resources impacted by the associated event. Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Preference Datatype Description Retrieve details for preferences. Preferences are used to allow the subscriber to modify their subscription in various ways. Details such as friendly name, keyname maximum and minimum values can be retrieved. These provide details to help configure subscriber preferences correctly. Local description A description of what the preference is used for. Type: string id Unique identifier for the notification preference.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber Datatype Description Local active Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime notificationId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeResourceId Type: integer Relational deliveryMethods Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method[] notification Type: SoftLayer_Notification

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Customer Datatype Description Local active Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime notificationId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeId Type: integer notificationSubscriberTypeResourceId Type: integer Relational deliveryMethods Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method[] notification Type: SoftLayer_Notification

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Subscriber_Delivery_Method Datatype Description Provides details for the subscriber’s delivery methods. Local active Indicates the subscriber's delivery method availability for notifications. Type: integer createDate Date the subscriber's delivery method was created. Type: dateTime modifyDate Date the subscriber's delivery method was last modified. Type: dateTime notificationDeliveryMethodId Identifier for the notification delivery method. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber Service Datatype Description A notification subscriber will have details pertaining to the subscriber’s notification subscription. You can receive details such as preferences, details of the preferences, delivery methods and the delivery methods for the subscriber. NOTE: There are preferences and delivery methods that cannot be modified. Also, there are some subscriptions that are required. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification::getObject Local active The current status of the subscription.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing Service Datatype Description A notification subscriber will have details pertaining to the subscriber’s notification subscription. You can receive details such as preferences, details of the preferences, delivery methods and the delivery methods for the subscriber. NOTE: There are preferences and delivery methods that cannot be modified. Also, there are some subscriptions that are required. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification::getObject Local active The current status of the subscription.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Delivery_Method
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Delivery_Method Datatype Description Provides mapping details of how the subscriber’s notification will be delivered. This maps the subscriber’s id with all the delivery method ids used to delivery the notification. Local active Determines if the delivery method is active for the user. Type: integer notificationMethodId Unique identifier of the method used to deliver notification. Type: integer notificationUserSubscriberId Unique identifier of the subscriber tied to the delivery method.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile Service Datatype Description A notification subscriber will have details pertaining to the subscriber’s notification subscription. You can receive details such as preferences, details of the preferences, delivery methods and the delivery methods for the subscriber. NOTE: There are preferences and delivery methods that cannot be modified. Also, there are some subscriptions that are required. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification::getObject Local active The current status of the subscription.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference Service Datatype Description Preferences are settings that can be modified to change the behavior of the subscription. For example, modify the limit preference to only receive notifications 10 times instead of 1 during a billing cycle. NOTE: Some preferences have certain restrictions on values that can be set. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber::editObject Local id Unique identifier for the subscriber's preferences. Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource Datatype Description Retrieve identifier cross-reference information. SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource provides the resource table id and subscriber id relation. The resource table id is the id of the service the subscriber receives alerts for. This resource table id could be the unique identifier for a Storage Evault service, Global Load Balancer or CDN service. Local notificationUserSubscriberId Unique identifier of the subscriber that will receive the alerts for the resource subscribed to a notification.

item.title: acknowledge
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User::acknowledge Acknowledge the associated [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]] for this impacted user. Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_UserInitParameters Return Values boolean

item.title: acknowledgeNotification
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event::acknowledgeNotification Overview <<<< EOT Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_EventInitParameters Return Values boolean

item.title: clearSnoozeTimer
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile::clearSnoozeTimer Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_MobileInitParameters Return Values boolean

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber::createObject Create a new notification subscriber. Overview Use the method to create a new subscription for a notification. This method is the entry method to the notification system. Certain properties are required to create a subscription while others are optional. The required property is the resourceRecord property which is type SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource. For the resourceRecord property, the only property that needs to be populated is the resourceTableId. The resourceTableId is the unique identifier of a SoftLayer service to create the subscription for.

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing::createObject Create a new notification subscriber. Overview Use the method to create a new subscription for a notification. This method is the entry method to the notification system. Certain properties are required to create a subscription while others are optional. The required property is the resourceRecord property which is type SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource. For the resourceRecord property, the only property that needs to be populated is the resourceTableId. The resourceTableId is the unique identifier of a SoftLayer service to create the subscription for.

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile::createObject Create a new notification subscriber. Overview Use the method to create a new subscription for a notification. This method is the entry method to the notification system. Certain properties are required to create a subscription while others are optional. The required property is the resourceRecord property which is type SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Resource. For the resourceRecord property, the only property that needs to be populated is the resourceTableId. The resourceTableId is the unique identifier of a SoftLayer service to create the subscription for.

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference::createObject Create a new notification preference for a subscriber. Overview Use the method to create a new notification preference for a subscriber Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference The SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference object that you wish to create. Required Headers authenticate Return Values boolean

item.title: createSubscriberForMobileDevice
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile::createSubscriberForMobileDevice Create a new subscriber for a given resource. Overview Create a new subscriber for a given resource. Parameters Name Type Description keyName string resourceTableId integer userRecordId integer Required Headers authenticate Return Values boolean

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber::editObject Edit a notification subscriber active status Overview The subscriber’s subscription status can be “turned off” or “turned on” if the subscription is not required. Subscriber preferences may also be edited. To edit the preferences, you must pass in the id off the preferences to edit. Here is an example of structure to pass in. In this example, the structure will set the subscriber status to active and the threshold preference to 90 and the limit preference to 20

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Billing::editObject Edit a notification subscriber active status Overview The subscriber’s subscription status can be “turned off” or “turned on” if the subscription is not required. Subscriber preferences may also be edited. To edit the preferences, you must pass in the id off the preferences to edit. Here is an example of structure to pass in. In this example, the structure will set the subscriber status to active and the threshold preference to 90 and the limit preference to 20

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Mobile::editObject Edit a notification subscriber active status Overview The subscriber’s subscription status can be “turned off” or “turned on” if the subscription is not required. Subscriber preferences may also be edited. To edit the preferences, you must pass in the id off the preferences to edit. Here is an example of structure to pass in. In this example, the structure will set the subscriber status to active and the threshold preference to 90 and the limit preference to 20

item.title: editObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference::editObjects Overview Parameters Name Type Description templateObjects SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference[] An array of skeleton SoftLayer_Notification_User_Subscriber_Preference objects with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate Return Values boolean

item.title: getImpactedAccountCount
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event::getImpactedAccountCount Get the number of impacted owned accounts for the current user. Overview This method will return the number of impacted owned accounts associated with this event for the current user. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_EventInitParameters Return Values integer

item.title: getImpactedAccounts
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event::getImpactedAccounts Retrieve a collection of accounts impacted by this event. Each impacted account record relates directly to a [[SoftLayer_Account]]. Overview Retrieve a collection of accounts impacted by this event. Each impacted account record relates directly to a [[SoftLayer_Account]]. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_EventInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_EventObjectMask SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_EventObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Account[]

item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event::getImpactedDeviceCount Get the number of impacted devices. Overview This method will return the number of impacted devices associated with this event for the current user. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_EventInitParameters Return Values integer

item.title: getImpactedDeviceCount
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User::getImpactedDeviceCount A count representing the number of the user’s devices currently impacted by the associated event will be returned. item.title: getImpactedDevices
